subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Professional sports drafts tend to be staid affairs, but at the 2010 N.F.L. draft Gerald McCoy started a trend that has caught on when he hugged Commissioner Roger Goodell.
snippet: Professional sports drafts tend to be staid affairs, but at the 2010 N.F.L. draft Gerald McCoy started a trend that has caught on when he hugged Commissioner Roger Goodell.
